languages.text: {n}Толпа в едином порыве, словно один человек, падает на колени перед вами. Взгляды, исполненные благоговения, теплы, словно лучи солнца. В многогласой молитве, обращенной к Императору, повторяется ваше имя.{/n}

{n}In a united impulse, the crowd falls to its knees before you. You see their eyes, awestruck and warm like sunlight. As they offer their many-voiced prayer to the Emperor, you hear your name uttered over and over again.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Толпа в едином порыве, словно один человек, падает на колени перед вами. Взгляды, исполненные благоговения, теплы, словно лучи солнца. В многогласой молитве, обращенной к Императору, повторяется ваше имя.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}In a united urge, the crowd, all as one, falls to its knees before you. You see their eyes, awestruck and warm like sunlight. As they offer their many-voiced prayer to the Emperor, you hear your name uttered over and over again.{/n}
traits.speaker: ImperialSoldier_Ranged_Prison

traits.locale_text: {n}In a united impulse, the crowd falls to its knees before you. You see their eyes, awestruck and warm like sunlight. As they offer their many-voiced prayer to the Emperor, you hear your name uttered over and over again.{/n}
traits.speaker: ImperialSoldier_Ranged_Prison

languages.text: {n}群衆は本能的にひとつになり、あなたの前にひざまずく。あなたは彼らの陽光のように温かな目を見る。多くの者たちが皇帝に祈りを捧げるとき、あなたの名前が何度も何度も繰り返し聞こえる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In a united impulse, the crowd falls to its knees before you. You see their eyes, awestruck and warm like sunlight. As they offer their many-voiced prayer to the Emperor, you hear your name uttered over and over again.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}群衆は本能的にひとつになり、あなたの前にひざまずく。あなたは彼らの陽光のように温かな目を見る。多くの者たちが皇帝に祈りを捧げるとき、あなたの名前が何度も何度も繰り返し聞こえる。{/n}
traits.speaker: ImperialSoldier_Ranged_Prison

languages.text: {n}所有人都心照不宣，跪在了你面前。你看着他们的眼睛，他们的目光充满了敬畏与温暖。当所有人同时向帝皇献上祈祷时，你听到大家一遍又一遍地提起了你的名字。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In a united impulse, the crowd falls to its knees before you. You see their eyes, awestruck and warm like sunlight. As they offer their many-voiced prayer to the Emperor, you hear your name uttered over and over again.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}所有人都心照不宣，跪在了你面前。你看着他们的眼睛，他们的目光充满了敬畏与温暖。当所有人同时向帝皇献上祈祷时，你听到大家一遍又一遍地提起了你的名字。{/n}
traits.speaker: ImperialSoldier_Ranged_Prison

languages.text: {n}En un impulso unánime, la multitud cae a tus pies. Ves sus ojos, asombrados y cálidos como la luz del sol. Mientras rezan al Emperador oyes tu nombre pronunciado una y otra vez.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In a united impulse, the crowd falls to its knees before you. You see their eyes, awestruck and warm like sunlight. As they offer their many-voiced prayer to the Emperor, you hear your name uttered over and over again.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}En un impulso unánime, la multitud, toda a una, cae a tus pies. Ves sus ojos, asombrados y cálidos como la luz del sol. Mientras rezan al Emperador oyes tu nombre pronunciado una y otra vez.{/n}
traits.speaker: ImperialSoldier_Ranged_Prison

languages.text: {n}Dann sinkt die versammelte Menge vor dir auf die Knie. Du siehst ihre Augen, ehrfürchtig und warm wie Sonnenlicht. Während sie ihr vielstimmiges Gebet zum Imperator sprechen, hörst du wieder und wieder deinen Namen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In a united impulse, the crowd falls to its knees before you. You see their eyes, awestruck and warm like sunlight. As they offer their many-voiced prayer to the Emperor, you hear your name uttered over and over again.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Wie durch einen einzigen Impuls fällt die gesamte Menge völlig synchron vor dir auf die Knie. Du siehst ihre Augen, ehrfürchtig und warm wie Sonnenlicht. Während sie ihr vielstimmiges Gebet zum Imperator sprechen, hörst du wieder und wieder deinen Namen.{/n}
traits.speaker: ImperialSoldier_Ranged_Prison

languages.text: {n}Comme un seul homme, la foule tombe à genoux, les yeux rivés sur vous. Alors qu'ils offrent des prières à l'Empereur, vous entendez répéter votre nom encore et encore.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In a united impulse, the crowd falls to its knees before you. You see their eyes, awestruck and warm like sunlight. As they offer their many-voiced prayer to the Emperor, you hear your name uttered over and over again.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Comme un seul homme, la foule tombe à genoux, les yeux rivés sur vous. Alors qu'ils offrent des prières à l'Empereur, vous entendez répéter votre nom encore et encore.{/n}
traits.speaker: ImperialSoldier_Ranged_Prison

languages.text: {n}Savaşçılar, cümbür cemaat karşında diz çöküyor. Gözlerinden huşuyla ve ümitle dolu olduklarını görebiliyorsun. İmparator'a edilen sayısız dua arasında kendi adını da defalarca işitiyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In a united impulse, the crowd falls to its knees before you. You see their eyes, awestruck and warm like sunlight. As they offer their many-voiced prayer to the Emperor, you hear your name uttered over and over again.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Savaşçılar cümbür cemaat karşında diz çöküyor. Gözlerinden huşu ve ümitle dolu olduklarını görebiliyorsun. İmparator'a edilen sayısız dua arasında kendi adını da defalarca işitiyorsun.{/n}
traits.speaker: ImperialSoldier_Ranged_Prison
